data.eml:eml: The genus Hylaeus Fabricius in Mongolia, an updated species inventory (Hymenoptera: Apoidea, Colletidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dathe, Holger H., Proshchalykin, Maxim Yu. (2016): The genus Hylaeus Fabricius in Mongolia, an updated species inventory (Hymenoptera: Apoidea, Colletidae). Zootaxa 4121 (4): 351-382, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4121.4.1
